enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 123-0 01 at 9AM.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: WCAS CHEM 103-0-01 General Physical Chemistry

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is the third and final course in the General Chemistry sequence. Topics covered in the course include the following: chemical equilibrium; equilibria in aqueous solution; chemical kinetics; electrochemistry and oxidation-reduction reactions; transition metals and special topics.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Student must earn a grade of C- or better in Chemistry 102-0 and Chemistry 122-0.

Students enrolled in this course MUST also enroll in the associated laboratory course, Chem 123-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
General Chemistry, Petrucci et al., 11th Edition, Pearson ($338 new; $253.65 used)***
Access to Sapling Learning homework ($27; details provided on first day of class)
Model QT or NXT Response Device ("Clicker") and associated license ($58.65 new; $44.00 used)
Scientific Calculator (starting at $10)

***Prices as listed by the Northwestern Norris Bookstore (2/3/17). Course materials may be available from other vendors at lower prices.

subject: CHEM
